name: Salsa Chicken with Rice
description: An easy weeknight meal made in minutes.
preparation: Season chicken with Sea Salt and Pepper. Heat a frying pan to medium-high. Add oil and brown chicken on both sides.
Add rice and Taco Seasoning. Stir often and lightly toast rice for 2–3 minutes. Add water and Nourish Bouillon, stir and bring to a gentle boil.

Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and simmer for 30–40 minutes, or until rice is tender and chicken is fully cooked. Spoon rice onto plates and place chicken on top. Dish up with spoonfuls of prepared Salsa, if desired.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Jar)
summary: Classic Tex-Mex flavor with medium heat.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.
